p: Sera collected from horses and cattle in 2003–2010 in the States of Veracruz and Tabasco were tested in almost all cases by both plaque reduction neutralization test (PRNT) and HI assays. The one exception was horse sera collected in the State of Tamaulipas in 2003–2004, in which IgM/IgG enzyme-linked immunosorbent assays (ELISAs) were also performed.
